descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Karl-Anthony Towns drives past his defender and somehow drains the and-1.
videos.headline: KAT drives into the paint and knocks down the and-1

videos.description: Isaiah Roby steals the rock and finishes with the and-1 over Karl-Anthony Towns.
videos.headline: Isaiah Roby gets it done on both sides of the ball

videos.description: Karl-Anthony Towns gathers the rock and drains the 3-pointer from the top of the key.
videos.headline: The 3-point champ is still hot from beyond the arc

videos.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander sends his defender sliding across the hardwood with this mean crossover for the bucket.
videos.headline: SGA sits his defender down with this filthy crossover for the bucket
